title: Wytchfae Runes
description: --- This title is not currently available ---PARANORMAL DARK FANTASY ROMANCEFaery witch Kelly O’Day’s job is to transition ghosts to their afterlife. When she falls for sexy Viking ghost Ingvar Hrothson she breaks the rule against personal involvement. Cursed to roam the earth as a restless spirit, Ingvar is hell bent on two things—save his sister and destroy the evil sorceress responsible for her death. He never dreamed he would be bewitched by a flesh and blood woman with magical powers. Kelly and Ingvar battle sinister forces and attempts on their lives. With their attraction approaching supernova, the couple must decide whether their romance is also worth fighting for.Opening Line: In a star’s blink, a claw like hand gripped Ingvar’s throat and crushed him against the wall.One line teaser: Kelly had seen Ingvar transform from insubstantial apparition to hot red blooded male.
author: Flossie Benton Rogers
